desc: Leather Sofa & Sectional | Choice Leather is a premier online retailer of leather sofa, sectional sofas & leather furniture. We offer affordable premium leather furniture made here in Canada using genuine Italian leather. We specialize in smaller compact sofas & sectionals for new home owners and urban condo dwellers.

layout.text: Quality Made in Canada Upholstery Leather and Fabric Furniture. Contemporary, Transitional, and Traditional Styles
